 Talk How to Set a Buddy Icon on iChat   
 iChat is a wonderful instant messenger application for Macintosh computers. Many people may be new to iChat and don't know how to set a buddy icon on iChat. This will show you how. 
 Steps Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-1.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/97\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-1.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 1 
 Find a picture of your choosing.  It can be from the Internet, from the iChat icon folder (Not available on Mac OSX 10.5), or it can be your favorite picture of yourself.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/db\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/db\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345.63186813187,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":571.04395604396} 
 2 
 Know that once you have your picture ready, you have two options.  For option one (the easiest way) continue reading. For option two, go to step 5.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-3.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346.8956043956,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":573.13186813187} 
 3 
 Click the picture that you would like and drag it into the small box in the upper right-hand corner of the iChat Buddy List. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-4.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/95\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-4.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345.63186813187,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":571.04395604396} 
 4 
 Open a screen (if it doesn't, click on the small picture and go to the bottom of the drop-down box to, "Edit Picture. ..") and you can choose to zoom in and out on the picture to get it to fit just right. There you are, you now have a new buddy icon that's easy to edit and change at any time.
 On the menu bar in the top left corner, click iChat. 
 On the list, choose, "Change My Picture". 
 It will open a window. At the bottom of this window, click 'Choose. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dd\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/dd\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-5.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":344.36813186813,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":568.95604395604} 
 5 
 Know that if you have a picture saved on your computer, you can find the file and then click open. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/82\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-6.jpg\/v4-460px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/82\/Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-6.jpg\/v4-760px-Set-a-Buddy-Icon-on-iChat-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570} 
 6 
 Zoom in and out on the picture to get it to fit just right.  There you are, you now have a new buddy icon that's easy to edit and change at any time.
